Free deals

Gain access to free deals from CIDgravity clients immediately upon claiming your miner

Lightweight and unpriviled connector script

The CIDgravity connector is an unprivileged open source python script. It leverages the standard dealFilter hooks called on each deal request.

It does NOT require to open any ports, need access to any Filecoin keys, nor run as a deamon.

Check it on Github

Deployed in less than 30 minutes

1
Claim address

To successfully confirm ownership of your address, we kindly request to sign a message

2
Install connector

Install our lightweight, unprivileged and open source python source to communicate with all CIDgravity services

Features spotlight

Discover a seamless experience for managing deals flow

monetization_on
Pricing management
Craft dynamic pricing rules that cater to diverse deal criteria such as size, duration, and more
verified_user
Clients management
Establish client profiles for streamlined identification and application of preferential pricing strategies
filter_list
Storage acceptance logic
Automatic decisions to accept or decline deals based on the current status of the sealing pipeline
block
Blacklist
Safeguard against specific clients sending deals to your miner by implementing restrictions
settings
Rate limiting
Ensure optimal performance of your miner by setting limits, preventing overload and maintaining efficiency
pie_chart
Analytics
Gain access to a suite of diverse reporting tools, empowering you to track and analyze storage business trends
